tags.name: vscode-badge
tags.description:
Show counts or status information. Badges can also be used within [Textfield](https://vscode-elements.github.io/components/textfield) and [TabHeader](https://vscode-elements.github.io/components/tabs) components.
---


### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--vscode-font-family** - A sans-serif font type depends on the host OS. _(default: sans-serif)_
- **--vscode-contrastBorder** - undefined _(default: transparent)_
- **--vscode-badge-background** - default and counter variant background color _(default: #616161)_
- **--vscode-badge-foreground** - default and counter variant foreground color _(default: #f8f8f8)_
- **--vscode-activityBarBadge-background** - activity bar variant background color _(default: #0078d4)_
- **--vscode-activityBarBadge-foreground** - activity bar variant foreground color _(default: #ffffff)_

tags.name: vscode-button

- **--vscode-font-size** - undefined _(default: 13px)_
- **--vscode-font-weight** - undefined _(default: normal)_
- **--vscode-button-secondaryForeground** - undefined _(default: #cccccc)_

- **--vscode-button-secondaryHoverBackground** - undefined _(default: #3c3c3c)_
- **--vscode-focusBorder** - undefined _(default: #0078d4)_

tags.name: vscode-checkbox
tags.description:
Allows users to select one or more options from a set. When participating in a form, it supports
the `:invalid` pseudo class. Otherwise the error styles can be applied through the `invalid`
property.
---


### **Events:**
 - **change** - Dispatched when checked state is changed. The event is bubbled, so it can be listened on a parent element like the `CheckboxGroup`.
- **vsc-change**
- **invalid** - Dispatched when the element is invalid and `checkValidity()` has been called or the form containing this element is submitted. [MDN Reference](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/HTMLInputElement/invalid_event)

### **Methods:**
 - **checkValidity(): _boolean_** - Returns `true` if the element's value is valid; otherwise, it returns `false`.
If the element's value is invalid, an invalid event is triggered on the element.

[MDN Reference](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/HTMLInputElement/checkValidity)
- **reportValidity(): _boolean_** - Returns `true` if the element's value is valid; otherwise, it returns `false`.
If the element's value is invalid, an invalid event is triggered on the element, and the
browser displays an error message to the user.

[MDN Reference](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/HTMLInputElement/reportValidity)

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--vscode-font-family** - undefined _(default: sans-serif)_
- **--vscode-font-size** - undefined _(default: 13px)_
- **--vscode-font-weight** - undefined _(default: normal)_
- **--vscode-foreground** - undefined _(default: #cccccc)_
- **--vscode-settings-checkboxBackground** - undefined _(default: #313131)_
- **--vscode-settings-checkboxBorder** - undefined _(default: #3c3c3c)_
- **--vscode-settings-checkboxForeground** - undefined _(default: #cccccc)_
- **--vscode-focusBorder** - undefined _(default: #0078d4)_
- **--vscode-inputValidation-errorBackground** - undefined _(default: #5a1d1d)_
- **--vscode-inputValidation-errorBorder** - undefined _(default: #be1100)_

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Name which is used as a variable name in the data of the form-container.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Attribute pair of the `label` property.

attributes.name: autofocus
attributes.description:
Automatically focus on the element when the page loads.

[MDN Reference](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/autofocus)

attributes.name: default-checked
attributes.description: The element's initial checked state, which will be restored when the containing form is reset.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description:
Associate a value to the checkbox. According to the native checkbox [specification](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/input/checkbox#value_2), If the component participates in a form:

- If it is unchecked, the value will not be submitted.
- If it is checked but the value is not set, `on` will be submitted.
- If it is checked and value is set, the value will be submitted.

tags.name: vscode-checkbox-group
tags.description:
Arranges a group of checkboxes horizontally or vertically.
---

tags.name: vscode-collapsible
tags.description:
Allows users to reveal or hide related content on a page.
---


### **Events:**
 - **vsc-collapsible-toggle** - Dispatched when the content visibility is changed.

### **Slots:**
 - _default_ - Main content.
- **actions** - You can place any action icon in this slot in the header, but it's also possible to use any HTML element in it. It's only visible when the component is open.
- **decorations** - The elements placed in the decorations slot are always visible.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--vscode-sideBar-background** - Background color _(default: #181818)_
- **--vscode-focusBorder** - Focus border color _(default: #0078d4)_
- **--vscode-font-family** - Header font family _(default: sans-serif)_
- **--vscode-sideBarSectionHeader-background** - Header background _(default: #181818)_
- **--vscode-icon-foreground** - Arrow icon color _(default: #cccccc)_
- **--vscode-sideBarTitle-foreground** - Header font color _(default: #cccccc)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **body** - Container for the toggleable content of the component. The container's overflow content is hidden by default. This CSS part can serve as an escape hatch to modify this behavior.

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: Component heading text

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Less prominent text than the title in the header

- **--vscode-toolbar-activeBackground** - Active state background color in `active-icon` mode _(default: rgba(99, 102, 103, 0.31))_
- **--vscode-focusBorder** - undefined _(default: #0078d4)_

attributes.name: combobox
attributes.description: Options can be filtered by typing into a text input field.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: The element cannot be used and is not focusable.

attributes.name: filter
attributes.description:
Search method in the filtered list within the combobox mode.

- contains - The list item includes the searched pattern at any position.
- fuzzy - The list item contains the letters of the search pattern in the same order, but at any position.
- startsWith - The search pattern matches the beginning of the searched text.
- startsWithPerTerm - The search pattern matches the beginning of any word in the searched text.

attributes.name: focused
attributes.description: Its value is true when element is focused.

attributes.name: open
attributes.description: Toggle the dropdown visibility.

attributes.name: position
attributes.description: Position of the options list when visible.

attributes.description:
Controls the draggable area size in pixels. it is intended to use the value
of `workbench.sash.size`.

attributes.name: initial-handle-position
attributes.description:
The handler position will reset to this position when it is double-clicked,
or the `resetHandlePosition()` is called.

attributes.name: handle-position
attributes.description:
Set the handle position programmatically. The value must include a unit,
either `%` or `px`. If no unit is specified, the value is interpreted as
`px`.

attributes.name: fixed-pane
attributes.description: The size of the fixed pane will not change when the component is resized.

attributes.name: columns

Initial column sizes in a JSON-encoded array.
Accepted values are:
- number
- string-type number (ex.: "100")
- px value (ex.: "100px")
- percentage value (ex.: "50%")
- percentage value (ex.: "50%")
- "auto" keyword

attributes.name: min-column-width
attributes.description:

- number
- string-type number (ex.: "100")
- px value (ex.: "100px")
- percentage value (ex.: "50%")
- percentage value (ex.: "50%")
- "auto" keyword

- **--vscode-input-placeholderForeground** - undefined _(default: #989898)_
- **--vscode-font-family** - undefined _(default: sans-serif)_
- **--vscode-font-size** - undefined _(default: 13px)_
- **--vscode-font-weight** - undefined _(default: normal)_
- **--vscode-editor-background** - undefined _(default: #1f1f1f)_
- **--vscode-editor-foreground** - undefined _(default: #cccccc)_
- **--vscode-editor-font-family** - undefined _(default: monospace)_
- **--vscode-editor-font-size** - undefined _(default: 14px)_
- **--vscode-editor-font-weight** - undefined _(default: normal)_
- **--vscode-editor-inlineValuesForeground** - undefined _(default: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5))_
- **--vscode-focusBorder** - undefined _(default: #0078d4)_
- **--vscode-scrollbarSlider-background** - undefined _(default: rgba(121, 121, 121, 0.4))_
- **--vscode-scrollbarSlider-hoverBackground** - undefined _(default: rgba(100, 100, 100, 0.7))_
- **--vscode-scrollbarSlider-activeBackground** - undefined _(default: rgba(191, 191, 191, 0.4))_

attributes.name: monospace
attributes.description:
Use monospace fonts. The font family, weight, size, and color will be the same as set in the
VSCode code editor.

tags.name: vscode-textfield
tags.description:
A simple inline textfield

When participating in a form, it supports the `:invalid` pseudo class. Otherwise the error styles
can be applied through the `invalid` property.
---


### **Events:**
 - **vsc-input**
- **change**
- **vsc-change**
- **input**

### **Methods:**
 - **checkValidity(): _boolean_** - Check the component's validity state when built-in validation is used.
Built-in validation is triggered when any validation-related attribute is set. Validation-related
attributes are: `max, maxlength, min, minlength, pattern, required, step`.
See this [the MDN reference](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/HTMLInputElement/checkValidity) for more details.

### **Slots:**
 - **content-before** - A slot before the editable area but inside of the component. It is used to place icons.
- **content-after** - A slot after the editable area but inside of the component. It is used to place icons.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--vscode-settings-textInputBackground** - undefined _(default: #313131)_
- **--vscode-settings-textInputBorder** - undefined _(default: var(--vscode-settings-textInputBackground, #3c3c3c))_
- **--vscode-settings-textInputForeground** - undefined _(default: #cccccc)_
- **--vscode-settings-textInputBackground** - undefined _(default: #313131)_
- **--vscode-focusBorder** - undefined _(default: #0078d4)_
- **--vscode-font-family** - A sans-serif font type depends on the host OS. _(default: sans-serif)_
- **--vscode-font-size** - undefined _(default: 13px)_
- **--vscode-font-weight** - undefined _(default: normal)_
- **--vscode-inputValidation-errorBorder** - undefined _(default: #be1100)_
- **--vscode-inputValidation-errorBackground** - undefined _(default: #5a1d1d)_
- **--vscode-input-placeholderForeground** - undefined _(default: #989898)_
- **--vscode-button-background** - undefined _(default: #0078d4)_
- **--vscode-button-foreground** - undefined _(default: #ffffff)_
- **--vscode-button-hoverBackground** - undefined _(default: #026ec1)_

attributes.name: invalid
attributes.description:
Set error styles on the component. This is only intended to apply styles when custom error
validation is implemented. To check whether the component is valid, use the checkValidity method.

attributes.name: pattern
attributes.description:
Specifies a regular expression the form control's value should match.
[MDN Reference](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Attributes/pattern)

attributes.name: type
attributes.description:
Same as the `type` of the native `<input>` element but only a subset of types are supported.
The supported ones are: `color`,`date`,`datetime-local`,`email`,`file`,`month`,`number`,`password`,`search`,`tel`,`text`,`time`,`url`,`week`

tags.description:

 - **change**

tags.description:
Simple container to arrange the toolar buttons

tags.name: vscode-tree
tags.description:
---


### **Events:**
 - **vsc-run-action** - Dispatched when an action icon is clicked.
- **vsc-select** - Dispatched when an item is selected.
- **vsc-tree-select** - Dispatched when an item is selected.
- **vsc-tree-action** - Dispatched when an action icon is clicked.

### **Methods:**
 - **closeAll(): _void_** - Closes all opened tree items recursively.
- **deselectAll()** - Deselects all selected items.
- **getItemByPath(path: _number[]_): __** - Returns a reference to a TreeItem object by path.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--vscode-focusBorder** - undefined _(default: undefined)_
- **--vscode-font-family** - undefined _(default: undefined)_
- **--vscode-font-size** - undefined _(default: undefined)_
- **--vscode-font-weight** - undefined _(default: undefined)_
- **--vscode-list-hoverForeground** - undefined _(default: undefined)_
- **--vscode-list-hoverBackground** - undefined _(default: undefined)_
- **--vscode-list-inactiveSelectionBackground** - undefined _(default: undefined)_
- **--vscode-list-inactiveSelectionForeground** - undefined _(default: undefined)_
- **--vscode-list-activeSelectionBackground** - undefined _(default: undefined)_
- **--vscode-list-activeSelectionForeground** - undefined _(default: undefined)_
- **--vscode-list-inactiveSelectionIconForeground** - undefined _(default: undefined)_
- **--vscode-list-inactiveFocusBackground** - undefined _(default: undefined)_
- **--vscode-list-inactiveFocusOutline** - undefined _(default: undefined)_
- **--vscode-list-focusOutline** - undefined _(default: undefined)_
- **--vscode-tree-inactiveIndentGuidesStroke** - undefined _(default: undefined)_
- **--vscode-tree-indentGuidesStroke** - undefined _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **text-content** - undefined
- **description** - undefined
- **counter-badge-decoration** - undefined
- **filled-circle-decoration** - undefined
- **caption-decoration** - undefined
- **decorations** - Container of decorations
